directions: In a glass or ceramic bowl, stir together the bourbon, pineapple juice concentrate, soy sauce, cider vinegar, water, garlic, ginger, and hot pepper sauce. Add desired meat to dish and turn to coat. Marinate in the refrigerator before grilling as desired. Discard marinade after using.
ingredients: 1/3 cup frozen pineapple juice concentrate, thawed and undiluted
1 teaspoon minced garlic, or to taste
3 dashes hot pepper sauce, or to taste (optional)
title: Kentucky Bourbon Marinade
